items.name: Kiara's Determination
explicitMods: Immunity to Freeze, Chill, Curses and Stuns during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Travelers of the deep wood speak of a witch
whose ale provides a different kind
of liquid courage.

items.name: Breathstealer

flavourText: The last gasp is not always one's final act.
<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 5 additional targets

items.name: Atziri's Foible
explicitMods: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric.
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White.
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same.
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

items.name: Cloak of Defiance
enchantMods: Grants +1 to Maximum Mana per 2% Quality
flavourText: When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.

Enemies in Area deal 24% less Damage while at maximum Stages
